character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Noble Feature: • You can secure an audience with a local noble Fighter Features: • Fighting Style - Great Weapon Fighting: Reroll 1's and 2's on two-handed melee weapon damage dice • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Tavern Brawler: Your unarmed strikes deal d4 damage, you are proficient in unarmed strikes and improvised weapons, can make a grapple as a bonus action after hitting with one, and +1 to either Str or Con Monk Features: • Add Wis mod to AC when not wearing armor or using a shield • When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action • You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump • When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet • When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules) • Monk Archetype: Hand • When you hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack you can inflict an additional effect (see rules) • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Knight • Three allies within 60ft heal your level in hp when you second wind • Mounted Combatant: You can redirect an attack against your mount to yourself, you gain advantage vs unmounted foes, and your mount gains Evasion ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields Light Armor, Shortswords ⊠Simple character.noteList: Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest • Perception proficiency • Longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow proficiency • Gain 1 wizard cantrip Cloistered Scholar Feature: • You have information about your cloister and you can use its library. Other libraries are also more likely to admit you. Paladin Features: • As an action, detect the location of any celestial, fiend or undead and any consecrated or desecrated place or object within 60 feet (1 + Cha mod per day) • Gain a reservoir of healing power (25hp), and as an action, you can heal a creature you touch by draining that power. You can also cure one poison or disease from the creature by sacrificing 5hp from the reservoir • Fighting Style - Dueling: +2 damage when using a single one-handed weapon • You can sacrifice a spell slot to deal (1 + spell level)d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 extra damage vs undead/fiends, when you hit with a melee weapon attack • Gain immunity to disease • Paladin Archetype: Crown • Champion Challenge (see rules) • Turn the Tide (see rules) • Dual Wielder: You can draw/stow two weapons per round, you can dual wield non-light weapons, and you gain +1 AC while dual wielding • You can make two attacks on your turn ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Longsword Shortsword Shortbow Longbow Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠⊠Common Elvish Extra Language Two Extra Languages ⊠chain mail rapier rapier dagger priest's pack holy symbol scholar's robes writing kit research book (borrowed) pouch ⊠⊠Paladin 5⊠High Elf⊠Cloistered Scholar⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Devinshire Poe⊠Paladin 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0

character.noteList:
Goliath Features: • Athletics proficiency • As a reaction, you can reduce damage you would take by 1d12 + Con (1/rest) • You can lift, drag, push, and carry weight as if one size larger • You are adapted to cold climates and high altitudes (see rules) Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Monk Features: • Add Wis mod to AC when not wearing armor or using a shield • When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action • You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump • When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet • When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules) • Monk Archetype: Death • Gain Wis mod + monk level temp hp when you down an adjacent foe • You can use a reaction to reduce fall damage by 5 x Monk level • Tavern Brawler: Your unarmed strikes deal d4 damage, you are proficient in unarmed strikes and improvised weapons, can make a grapple as a bonus action after hitting with one, and +1 to either Str or Con • You can make two attacks on your turn • You can spend 1 ki point when you hit a creature with a melee attack to force it to make a Con save or be stunned for a round ⊠⊠Simple character.noteList: Dragonborn Features: • Silver Dragon • You can breathe a 15 ft cone of Cold(once between rests), dealing 3d6 Cold damage, Con save for half damage (DC 11). DC = 8 + Con mod + prof • You resist Cold damage Guild Artisan Feature: • While you are in good standing with your guild, your guild can gain you access to powerful politicians Class Features: • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Fighting Style - Two-Weapon Fighting: Add ability modifier to off-hand damage • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Eldritch Knight • Form a magical bond with a weapon (see rules) • When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action • You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump • When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet • When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules) • Monk Archetype: Hand • When you hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack you can inflict an additional effect (see rules) • You can use a reaction to reduce fall damage by 5 x Monk level • Skilled: You gain three skill or tool proficiencies ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of artisan's tools ⊠Common Draconic One Extra Language ⊠two martial weapons light crossbow + 20 bolts OR two hand axes dungeoneer's pack OR explorer's pack set of artisan's tools of your choice letter of introduction set of bone dice OR deck of cards set of traveler's clothes belt pouch leather armor ⊠⊠Fighter 3, Monk 4⊠Dragonborn⊠Guild Artisan⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Dr Zana Haranthi⊠Fighter 3, Monk 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Noble Feature: • You can secure an audience with a local noble • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) • Durable: You always regain at least 2x Con mod from a hit die and you gain +1 Con Fighter Features: • Fighting Style - Great Weapon Fighting: Reroll 1's and 2's on two-handed melee weapon damage dice • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Knight • Three allies within 60ft heal your level in hp when you second wind • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Double proficiency with chosen skills (History,Insight) • Bard Archetype: Valor • You are proficient with martial weapons. medium armor, and shields • Allies can use your Bardic Inspiration on weapon damage rolls and as a reaction to increase their AC against one attack • Tavern Brawler: Your unarmed strikes deal d4 damage, you are proficient in unarmed strikes and improvised weapons, can make a grapple as a bonus action after hitting with one, and +1 to either Str or Con ⊠Light Armor Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields Medium Armor Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons Martial Weapons Improvised Weapons Unarmed Strikes ⊠One type of gaming set Any three musical instruments ⊠Common Extra Language One Extra Language ⊠leather armor longsword dagger diplomat's pouch any musical instrument set of fine clothes signet ring scroll of pedigree purse ⊠⊠Bard 3, Fighter 4⊠Human⊠Noble⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Duke Halifax⊠Bard 3, Fighter 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠25⊠0⊠0

character.noteList:
Goliath Features: • Athletics proficiency • As a reaction, you can reduce damage you would take by 1d12 + Con (1/rest) • You can lift, drag, push, and carry weight as if one size larger • You are adapted to cold climates and high altitudes (see rules) Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Paladin Features: • As an action, detect the location of any celestial, fiend or undead and any consecrated or desecrated place or object within 60 feet (1 + Cha mod per day) • Gain a reservoir of healing power (25hp), and as an action, you can heal a creature you touch by draining that power. You can also cure one poison or disease from the creature by sacrificing 5hp from the reservoir • Fighting Style - Great Weapon Fighting: Reroll 1's and 2's on two-handed melee weapon damage dice • You can sacrifice a spell slot to deal (1 + spell level)d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 extra damage vs undead/fiends, when you hit with a melee weapon attack • Gain immunity to disease • Paladin Archetype: Vengeance • Abjure Enemy: 1 action - Choose one seen creature w/in 60 ft. That creature must make a Wisdom save unless it is immune to being frightened. On a failed save, the target is frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage. While frightened, target's speed is reduced to 0. On a successful save, target's speed is halved for 1 minute or until it takes damage. • Vow of Enmity: Bonus Action - Choose one seen creature within 10 ft. Your attack rolls against the target have advantage for the next minute or until the creature falls to 0 hp. • War Caster: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack • You can make two attacks on your turn ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of gaming set Thieves' Tools ⊠Common Giant ⊠chain mail battleaxe warhammer javelin (5) priest's pack holy symbol crowbar set of dark common clothes hood belt pouch

character.noteList: Dragonborn Features: • Brass Dragon • You can breathe a 30 ft line of Fire(once between rests), dealing 2d6 Fire damage, Dex save for half damage (DC 11). DC = 8 + Con mod + prof • You resist Fire damage Soldier Feature: • You have influence within your former army/organization Class Features: • Add Wis mod to AC when not wearing armor or using a shield • When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action • You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump • When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet • When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules) • Monk Archetype: Hand • When you hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack you can inflict an additional effect (see rules) • You can use a reaction to reduce fall damage by 5 x Monk level • Resilient: You gain proficiency with one save and +1 to that ability ⊠⊠Simple Weapons, Shortswords ⊠Cook's Utensils One type of gaming set Vehicles (land) ⊠Common Draconic ⊠quarterstaff ten darts explorer's pack rank insignia trophy set of bone dice set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Monk 4⊠Dragonborn⊠Soldier⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Lantheon Vaazrus⊠Monk 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Dwarf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Advantage on saves vs poison, poison damage resistance • Double proficiency bonus to History checks concerning stonework (even if not proficient) • Battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, warhammer proficiency • Gain 1 extra hit point per level Acolyte Feature: • Receive aid from those who share your faith Cleric Features: • Cleric Archetype: Forge • Proficiency Heavy Armor, Smith's Tools • You can make a nonmagical weapon or armor a +1 magic item until you die or take a long rest, once after a long rest • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) • Turn Undead (see rules) • Artisan's Blessing (see rules) • Squat Nimbleness: You have advantage on grapple escape attempts, +5 feet to speed, gain Athletics or Acrobatics proficiency, and +1 Str or Dex • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Insight,Religion) • Bard Archetype: Lore • You are proficient in three additional skills • You can spend a use of Bardic Inspiration as a reaction to give a creature within 60 feet a penalty on an attack roll, damage roll, or ability check ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields Heavy Armor Light Armor ⊠Battleaxe Handaxe Throwing Hammer Warhammer Simple Weapons ⊠Smith's Tools OR Brewer's Supplies OR Mason's Tools Smith's Tools One musical instrument ⊠Common Dwarvish Two Extra Languages ⊠scale mail shield mace light crossbow bolts (20) priest's pouch holy symbol holy symbol prayer book stick of incense (5) vestments set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Cleric 4, Bard 3⊠Hill Dwarf⊠Acolyte⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Molly⊠Cleric 4, Bard 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Haunted One Feature: • Commoners will do what they can to help you Wizard Features: • Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day) • Prodigy: You gain one language, one skill proficiency, one skill double proficiency, and one tool proficiency • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Arcana) Warlock Features: • Warlock Archetype: Old One • The spells dissonant whispers and hideous laughter are added to the warlock spell list for you • You can telepathically communicate with any creature that knows any language within 30 feet • Wizard Archetype: Transmutation • Half gold/time cost to copy school spells • You can alter the composition of objects (see rules) • War Caster: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack • Forceful Cantrip: You can push creatures you hit with eldritch blast ten feet • Mage Armor Expert: You don't use a spell slot when casting mage armor on yourself • Tome: You can cast three cantrips from any class (see rules) • The spells detect thoughts and phantasmal force are added to the warlock spell list for you • Resilient: You gain proficiency with one save and +1 to that ability ⊠Light Armor ⊠Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows Simple Weapons ⊠One tool proficiency ⊠Common Extra Language One Exotic Language One extra language ⊠dagger arcane focus scholar's pack spellbook set of common clothes monster hunter's pack important trinket ⊠⊠Wizard 4, Warlock 4⊠Human⊠Haunted One⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Munro⊠Wizard 4, Warlock 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Haunted One Feature: • Commoners will do what they can to help you Wizard Features: • Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day) • Elemental Adept: Your spells that deal one of acid/cold/fire/lightning/thunder ignore resistance, and you can treat rolled 1s as 2s for those spells Warlock Features: • Warlock Archetype: Undead • The spells false life and ray of sickness are added to the warlock spell list for you • You know spare the dying • You repel attacks by undead (see rules) • Wizard Archetype: Evocation • Half gold/time cost to copy school spells • Exclude 1 + spell level creatures from your evocations • Grasping Eldritch Blast: Your eldritch blast can pull targets 10 feet • Mage Armor Expert: You don't use a spell slot when casting mage armor on yourself • War Caster: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack • Tome: You can cast three cantrips from any class (see rules) • The spells blindness/deafness and silence are added to the warlock spell list for you • Resilient: You gain proficiency with one save and +1 to that ability • Your cantrips deal half damage on a save ⊠Light Armor ⊠Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows Simple Weapons ⊠⊠Common Extra Language One Exotic Language ⊠dagger arcane focus scholar's pack spellbook set of common clothes monster hunter's pack important trinket ⊠⊠Wizard 6, Warlock 4⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Munro Andelmaus⊠Wizard 6, Warlock 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Elf Features: • Within 120 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest • Perception proficiency • While in direct sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks • Can cast the dancing lights cantrip. At 3rd level, faerie fire (1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs) • Rapier, shortsword, and hand crossbow proficiency Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Rogue Features: • Double proficiency with chosen skills • Sneak Attack (1d6) • Understand a secret language • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Deception,Stealth) • You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action • Rogue Archetype: Arcane Trickster • Special abilities with mage hand (see rules) • Dark Elf Magic: 1/day you can cast dispel magic and levitate, and can at will cast detect magic Warlock Features: • Warlock Archetype: Hexblade • The spells shield and wrathful smite are added to the warlock spell list for you • 1/rest as a bonus action you can curse a creature for 1 minute, healing level + Cha mod hp when it dies, critting it on a 19, and dealing it proficiency bonus extra damage • Gain martial weapon, shield, and medium armor proficiency • You can use Charisma for attack and damage rolls with your pact weapons and one one-handed weapon you choose at the start of each day • Disguise Self Expert: You don't use a spell slot when casting disguise self • Potent Cantrip: Your eldritch blast does Cha mod extra damage • Blade: You gain the ability to conjure a magical weapon (see rules) • The spells blur and branding smite are added to the warlock spell list for you • Elven Accuracy: You can reroll a Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha attack, and +1 Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha • You can use a reaction to take half damage when hit by a foe that you see • Double proficiency with chosen character.noteList: Tabaxi Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • You can double your speed for a turn when you move but must spend a turn not moving before using this again • You can claw as an unarmed attack for 1d4 slashing damage and can climb with a 20 speed Barbarian Tribe Member Feature: • You can forage for twice as much food and water while in the wilderness and have knowledge of barbarian lands Fighter Features: • Fighting Style - Archery: +2 to attack with ranged weapons • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Battle Master • Gain four superiority dice (d8) to spend on maneuvers • One artisan's tools proficiency • Riposte: You can use a reaction when missed by a melee attack to make a melee attack back and deal Superiority Die extra damage • Lunge: You can cause your next melee attack to have 5 extra feet of range and deal Superiority Die extra damage • Evade: You can gain Superiority Die to AC while moving • Martial Adept: You gain a superiority die and two battle master maneuvers • Cleave: You can cause one creature adjacent to one you hit with a melee weapon to take Superiority Die damage if the same attack roll would hit • Feint: You can spend a bonus action to grant your next attack against an adjacent foe advantage and Superiority Die extra damage ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of artisan's tools or musical instrument One artisan's tools proficiency ⊠Common Extra Language One Extra Language ⊠leather armor longbow rapier whip handaxe (2) arrows (20) dungeoneer's pack set of traveler's clothes hunting trap tattoos or totem pouch ⊠⊠Fighter 4⊠Tabaxi⊠Barbarian Tribe Member⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Otaku⊠Fighter 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Halfling Features: • Can reroll a natural 1 • Advantage on saves vs frightened • Can move through larger creatures' spaces • Can hide while obscured by larger creatures Entertainer Feature: • Your performances tend to make people like you, and you can always find somewhere to perform • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) Cleric Features: • Cleric Archetype: Trickery • You can touch an ally as an action to grant it advantage on stealth checks for one hour or until you use this ability again • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Turn Undead (see rules) • Invoke Duplicity (see rules) • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Performance,Stealth) • Bard Archetype: Glamour • You can spend a use of Bardic Inspiration as a bonus action to allow Cha mod creatures within 60 feet that can see you to move their speed without provoking as a reaction and grant them 5 temp hp (see rules) • Once per rest you can attempt to charm up to Cha mod creatures in your audience (see rules) • Tough: You gain 2 extra hp per level ⊠Light Armor Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠Disguise kit One type of musical instrument Any three musical instruments ⊠Common Halfling ⊠leather armor rapier dagger entertainer's pack any musical instrument one musical instrument of your choice a favor from an admirer costume belt pouch ⊠⊠Bard 4, Cleric 3⊠Lightfoot Halfling⊠Entertainer⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Piper ⊠Bard 4, Cleric 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Dragonborn Features: • Silver Dragon • You can breathe a 15 ft cone of cold (once between rests), dealing 2d6 cold damage, Dex save for half damage. DC = 8 + Con mod + prof • You resist cold damage Entertainer Feature: • Your performances tend to make people like you, and you can always find somewhere to perform • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) Barbarian Features: • 2/day you gain advantage on Str checks and saves, deal +2 damage on strength based melee attacks, and resistance vs bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage • Add Con mod to AC when not wearing armor • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Acrobatics,Performance) • Bard Archetype: Valor • You are proficient with martial weapons. medium armor, and shields • Allies can use your Bardic Inspiration on weapon damage rolls and as a reaction to increase their AC against one attack • You can gain advantage on Str based melee attacks by granting advantage to attacks against you for the round • You gain advantage on Dex saves vs things you can see • Actor: You gain advantage on deception and performance checks to impersonate someone else, you can imitate the sounds or speech of another creature, and you gain +1 Cha ⊠Light Armor Shields Medium Armor Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons Martial Weapons ⊠Disguise kit One type of musical instrument Any three musical instruments ⊠Common Draconic ⊠leather armor longsword dagger entertainer's pack any musical instrument one musical instrument of your choice a favor from an admirer costume belt pouch ⊠⊠Bard 4, Barbarian 2⊠Dragonborn⊠Entertainer⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Rupert⊠Bard 4, Barbarian 2⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Dwarf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Advantage on saves vs poison, poison damage resistance • Double proficiency bonus to History checks concerning stonework (even if not proficient) • Battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, warhammer proficiency • Gain 1 extra hit point per level Faction Agent Feature: • Your faction has secret agents you can contact for information or support Rogue Features: • Double proficiency with chosen skills • Sneak Attack (3d6) • Understand a secret language • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Deception,Persuasion) • You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action • Rogue Archetype: Thief • You can use an object, use thieves' tools, or sleight of hand as a Cunning Action • You can climb at full speed and jump Dex mod feet further • Skilled: You gain three skill or tool proficiencies • You can use a reaction to take half damage when hit by a foe that you see • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Insight,Stealth) ⊠Light Armor ⊠Battleaxe Handaxe Throwing Hammer Warhammer Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠Smith's Tools OR Brewer's Supplies OR Mason's Tools Thieves' Tools ⊠Common Dwarvish Two Extra Languages Thieves' Cant ⊠rapier shortbow dagger (2) arrows (20) burglar's pack thieves' tools Emblem or badge faction book set of common clothes pouch ⊠⊠Rogue 6⊠Hill Dwarf⊠Faction Agent⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Tobish⊠Rogue 6⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

character.noteList: Half-Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Two extra skill proficiencies of your choosing Cloistered Scholar Feature: • You have information about your cloister and you can use its library. Other libraries are also more likely to admit you. Bard Features: • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Double proficiency with chosen skills (History,Performance) • Bard Archetype: Lore • You are proficient in three additional skills • You can spend a use of Bardic Inspiration as a reaction to give a creature within 60 feet a penalty on an attack roll, damage roll, or ability check • Spell Sniper: Your spells ignore ½ and ¾ cover, your ranged attack roll spells have doubled range, and you gain one attack roll cantrip (see rules) ⊠Light Armor ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠Any three musical instruments ⊠Common Elvish Extra Language Two Extra Languages ⊠leather armor club dagger entertainer's pack any musical instrument scholar's robes writing kit research book (borrowed) pouch ⊠⊠Bard 4⊠Variant⊠Cloistered Scholar⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Tom⊠Bard 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0

Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Entertainer Feature: • Your performances tend to make people like you, and you can always find somewhere to perform Class Features: • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) • Lucky: You can reroll a d20 roll you make or an attack against you 3/day • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Fighting Style - Dueling: +2 damage when using a single one-handed weapon • Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in • Song of Rest: You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest • Bard Archetype: Lore • You are proficient in three additional skills • You can spend a use of Bardic Inspiration as a reaction to give a creature within 60 feet a penalty on an attack roll, damage roll, or ability check Double proficiency with chosen skills (Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, Insight, Performance) • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Champion • Crit on 19 • Skilled: You gain three skill or tool proficiencies • Inspiration improves to d8 • Regain Bardic Inspiration with short rest • You can perform as an action to give yourself and allies who can hear you advantage on saves vs charm and frightened for one round • You can learn two more spells from any class • Weapon Master: You gain four weapon proficiencies and +1 to either Str or Dex • Mobile: You gain +10 to speed, ignore difficult terrain when you dash, and you don't provoke from creatures you've attacked that turn • Rest healing bonus improves to 1d8 • Inspiration improves to d10 • Two additional double proficient skills • You can learn two spells from any class • You can make two attacks on your turn ⊠Light Armor Medium Armor Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords Martial Weapons Any four weapons ⊠Any three musical instruments Disguise kit One type of musical instrument ⊠Common Extra Language ⊠rapier OR longsword OR simple weapon dagger leather armor diplomat's pouch OR entertainer's pouch lute OR any musical instrument one musical instrument of your choice a favor from an admirer costume belt pouch ⊠⊠Bard 10, Fighter 5⊠Human⊠Entertainer⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠William Of Waterdeep⊠Bard 10, Fighter 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0

Dragonborn Features: • Bronze Dragon • You can breathe a 30 ft line of Lightning(once between rests), dealing 4d6 Lightning damage, Dex save for half damage (DC 14). DC = 8 + Con mod + prof • You resist Lightning damage Soldier Feature: • You have influence within your former army/organization Class Features: • Cleric Archetype: Knowledge • Two extra languages, two knowledge skills with double proficiency bonus • Turn Undead (see rules) • Knowledge of the Ages (see rules) • Dual Wielder: You can draw/stow two weapons per round, you can dual wield non-light weapons, and you gain +1 AC while dual wielding • When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action • You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge • You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump • When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet • When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules) • Monk Archetype: Light • You can make a spell attack with 30ft range and radiant damage equal to your unarmed strike. When you use this attack you can expend a ki point and bonus action to repeat the attack twice • Kill CR ½ undead that fail save vs turning • Additional divinity per rest • Read Thoughts (see rules) • CR 1 undead can now be killed • Cleric cantrips deal Wis mod extra damage • Durable: You always regain at least 2x Con mod from a hit die and you gain +1 Con • You can use a reaction to reduce fall damage by 5 x Monk level ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons Shortswords ⊠One type of gaming set Vehicles (land) ⊠Common Draconic Two Extra Languages ⊠mace shield holy symbol light crossbow + 20 bolts OR one simple weapon priest's pack OR explorer's pack rank insignia trophy set of bone dice OR deck of cards set of common clothes belt pouch scale mail ⊠⊠Cleric 8, Monk 4⊠Dragonborn⊠Soldier⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Zarkanan Rangoth⊠Cleric 8, Monk 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
